Legal Practice Management Software

Clio’s attending the ABA Techshow.

We’re excited, and want to see you at this year’s ABA TECHSHOW! Second only to the Clio Cloud Conference the ABA TECHSHOW is a great way for legal professionals to learn about the latest, and most practical technologies in the legal space.

March 16-18, 2016 at the Hilton Chicago.

Clio. In person.

Located in spaces 401, 403 & 405.

We’ve got a big booth with plenty of space for everyone. We’ll even be showcasing a few of our integration partners. Don’t miss a live demo from two great ones, Ruby Receptionist and Vonage.

Ruby Receptionist

March 17th @ 10am

A virtual receptionist that ups your customer experience. Every call is answered in a friendly and professional manner.

Vonage

March 17th @ 2:45pm

A follow up demonstration on phone integration that will transform how you bill time on legal calls.

Be sure to come by and book a live demo with one of our representatives. We can walk you through all of Clio’s various functions, integrations, and even show you how Clio will fit perfectly into your practice.

Partly Cloudy to Cloudy – Is Your Practice Ready?

If you’re attending the conference, there’s one presentation that you won’t want to miss. Along with Heidi Alexander, and Larry Port, our very own CEO, Jack Newton, will be discussing moving your practice to the cloud.

March, 18th from 9:00 a.m. – 10:00 a.m.

Today, you can rent software or server access via the internet and thereby avoid any up-front costs. This process is often referred to as “moving to the cloud.” Of course, your client data would also be stored on the rented or hosted servers. This, must-see seminar, explains the associated pros, cons, risks and ethical issues of doing this with your practice.
